description:
The bugs have safely made it through the warp tunnel and are finally back in the solar system, but Lancelot`s words about the Earth`s destruction still weigh heavily on their minds. Suddenly, a mysterious unidentified spaceship approaches the Stork, and traps the ship in a laser anchor, rendering the supply ship uncontrollable. Midge finally manages to shake off the mysterious vessel, but the bugs are shocked when a human figure in a space suit appears on their screen, demanding their cooperation. Just who is this mysterious figure? And why has he captured the Stork?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mysterious Ghost Ship Appears! / The Stork in Despair
Nazo no Yuureisen Arawaru! / Zetsubou no Stork
謎の幽霊船現る! / 絶望のストーク
